name: Bravo Sample: App Store Assets Kit
description:
The Bravo Publication assets kit covers the basic Apple and Android assets you need for the publication process of a mobile app.


Store screenshots, app icon, splash screen, and Android store banner are included.


✨Bravo tip✨

Icon app and splash screen by using Bravo Tags and automatic will be included in the app builds generated in Bravo. Learn how it works.


www.bravostudio.app
